channel.title: Stall Dc's players
channel.description: Hello, im trying to add stalls to my 317 server and when ever a player tries to theiv a stall it dc's them. Any solutions to my problem? Thanks. Tell me if you need anything.

item.title: Stall Dc's players
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

if(objectID == 6166){ TheifStall("Crafting Stall", "and recieve 250k", 25, 75*playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 6162){ TheifStall("Magic Stall", "and recieve 1m", 99, 7500*playerLevel[17], 995, 1000000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 6163){ TheifStall("Food Stall", "and recieve 150k", 1, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 150000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 6165){ TheifStall("General Stall", "and recieve 350k", 65, 1500*playerLevel[17], 995, 350000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 6164){ TheifStall("Scimitar Stall", "and recieve 500k", 80, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 500000, 0x340); }

Read full topic

item.title: Stall Dc's players
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(0x340); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM("Enjoy your Cash!"); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

Read full topic
